Package transbit.tbits.mail

Interface Summary
IMailPreProcessor Plugins can implement this interface if they want to be executed before composing mail for any user

LogMailRequest The LogMailRequest class is used to log/append the request into the database via Mail

TBitsMailer This class sends a mail to the analysts whenever a new request is logged or a new action is done.
